text: In Kanye West ’ s latest single he raps about wanting to smash on wife Kim Kardashian ’ s sisters. We ’ ve got her mom Kris Jenner ’ s reaction to Yeezy ’ s wild new song. On Aug. 11 he released the song “ XTCY ” where not only did he rap about the club drug, he also rhymed about how much he fantasized about having sex with wife Kim Kardashian ‘ s four hot sisters.
